about.title: Hi, I'm Axel
about.description: Systems Engineer and self-taught Front-End Software Engineer with one year of experience, passionate about learning, creating modern interfaces, and contributing to impactful projects.

experience.intro: Here you can see a little more about my experience and work as a Front-End Developer.

activities.title: My Activities
activities.text: Development and optimization of front-end components for internal tools.

activities.title: My Activities
activities.text: Focused on creating websites for small businesses, including design and development.

activities.title: My Activities
activities.text: Developing dashboards and digitalizing processes for enterprise clients.

repositories.intro: Here are some of my most recent repositories

sitestock.title: SiteStock
sitestock.description: A repository that provides the complete code for an advanced inventory management system, designed to streamline stock organization and control.

angulartemplateweb.title: AngularTemplateWeb
angulartemplateweb.description: An optimized template for quickly building basic websites. It features predefined routes and a functional, responsive layout with components like a navbar, sidebar, footer, and toggles for dark mode and translation.

cardsite.title: CardSite
cardsite.description: A specialized project for creating personalized digital invitations, featuring pre-configured secure routes and a focus on making events unique and memorable.
